publishedfiledetails.title: Peachy Decor
publishedfiledetails.description:
[h1]Description[/h1]
This mod was created for RolePlayers (RP) who want additional decor. It was made to look medieval in style but works for any era. All items can be picked up and do not require foundations to place.

Please take the time to give the mod a thumbs up and rate it. 
[img=https://i.imgur.com/p7Fv1Z6.gif[/img]

If you like the look of this mod make sure to Rate and Favorite it and Check out my other mods:
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1491573333] Peachy Furniture [/url]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1482267887] Peachy Worktables [/url]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1587890586] Peachy Viking Decor [/url]

[b] Mod ID 1517403145[/b]

Spawn codes and Engram list can be found in the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/discussions/1517403145] Discussion Tab [/url]

[h1]Peachy Decor Bench[/h1] You need this item to craft all other Decor items.

[h1]Books[/h1]
[list]
[*]Book x5
[*]Book Open x5
[*]Book Stack x3
[*]Note
[*]Scroll
[/list]
[h1]Curtains[/h1]
[list]
[*]Long Curtains x4
[*]Short Curtains x4
[/list]
[h1]Dishes[/h1]
[list]
[*]Beer Mug
[*]Bowls x 2
[*]Carving Knife
[*]Cutlery
[*]FryPan
[*]Glass
[*]Mixing Spoons
[*]Mugs x2
[*]Plate x2
[*]Pot x2
[*]Steak Knife
[*]TeaPot
[/list]
[h1]Food[/h1]
[list]
[*]Bag Berries
[*]Bag Seeds
[*]Bowl Soup
[*]LolliPops (Can craft LolliPops inside)
[*]Chicken Nuggets (Can craft Chicken Nuggets inside)
[*]Pie (Can craft Pie Slices inside)
[*]Pizza (Can craft Pizza Slices inside)
[*]Prime Meat
[*]Steak
[*]Bowl Salad (Can craft Salad inside)
[/list]
[h1]Fountains[/h1]
[list]
[*]Bird Bath
[*]Fountains x4
[/list]
[h1]Gifts[/h1]
[list]
[*]Bouquets x5
[*]Stuffed Cat x2
[*]Heart Shaped Box (Can craft Chocolates inside)
[*]Flower Vase x2
[*]Gift Boxes x4
[*]Single Rose x3
[*]Teddy Bears x2
[/list]
[h1]Graves[/h1]
[list]
[*]Graves x6
[*]Sarcophagus
[/list]
[h1]Lights[/h1] (Do not require fuel and torches can be turned off)
[list]
[*]Brazier x2
[*]Table Lamp
[*]Pathway Light
[*]Standing Torch
[*]Wall Lamp x2
[/list]
[h1]Mailboxes[/h1]
[list]
[*]Mailbox x4
[/list]
[h1]Market Stall[/h1]
[list]
[*]Market Stall - Paintable and can place items on it such as signs etc.
[/list]
[h1]Medical Bag[/h1]
[list]
[*]Medical Bag 
[*]Blood
[*]Extractor
[*]Bowl of Leeches
[*]Decorative Narcotic
[*]Potion
[*]Powders x 3
[*]Scalpel Set
[*]Spoiled Meat
[*]Decorative Stimulant
[/list]
[h1]Misc[/h1]
[list]
[*]Basket
[*]Crunk Safe
[*]Log Pile
[*]Potter x3
[*]Sacks x3
[/list]
[h1]Rugs[/h1]
[list]
[*]Large Rugs x5
[*]Small Rugs x5
[*]Welcome Mat
[/list]
[h1]Statues[/h1]
[list]
[*]Large Statues x4
[*]Small Statues x4
[/list]
